milestones.title: MVP Backend
milestones.description: Domain model, migrations, services, REST API, tests

issues.title: Repo hardening. Java 21 and Maven Wrapper
issues.body: Set Java toolchain to 21 in pom.xml. Ensure Maven Wrapper committed. Verify clean build with mvnw.

issues.title: Add core Spring starters
issues.body: Add web, validation, data jpa, actuator, springdoc openapi ui, lombok, postgresql to pom.xml.

issues.title: Add code quality plugins
issues.body: Add Spotless for formatting. Add Checkstyle. Add Jacoco. Configure fail on low coverage threshold you choose.

issues.title: Establish base package layout
issues.body: Create packages controller, service, repository, domain, dto, config, exception under com.yourorg.oms.

issues.title: Profiles and configuration
issues.body: Create application.yml that sets spring.profiles.active=dev. Add application-dev.yml using H2. Add application-prod.yml for Postgres using env vars.

issues.title: Enable Actuator basics
issues.body: Expose health and info endpoints only by default. Document URLs.

issues.title: Introduce Flyway and disable ddl auto
issues.body: Add Flyway. Turn off hibernate ddl auto for dev once migrations are present. Verify migration runs on startup.

issues.title: Flyway V1 baseline schema
issues.body: Create V1 baseline with tables product, customer, orders, order_item. Add primary keys, FKs, not null, unique sku, indexes on product.sku, orders.created_at, orders.status.

issues.title: Domain entities and enums
issues.body: Create Product, Customer, Order, OrderItem with OrderStatus enum values NEW CONFIRMED SHIPPED DELIVERED CANCELLED. Add validation annotations and @Version on aggregates.

issues.title: Map JPA relationships
issues.body: Order one to many OrderItem. OrderItem many to one Product. Order many to one Customer. Set cascade and fetch as needed.

issues.title: Repositories
issues.body: Create ProductRepository, CustomerRepository, OrderRepository, OrderItemRepository. Add query methods for status, date range, and low stock.

issues.title: OrderService core flow
issues.body: Implement placeOrder that validates stock, computes totals, persists order and items, decrements inventory in one transaction.

issues.title: Order read and status operations
issues.body: Implement getOrder, listOrders with filters and pageable, updateStatus with legal transition checks, cancelOrder with restock logic.

issues.title: ProductService CRUD and stock adjustments
issues.body: Implement create, list, update price or stock. Add low stock finder.

issues.title: DTOs and mapping
issues.body: Create CreateOrderRequest with customer and line items. Create OrderResponse with items and totals. Create ProductRequest and ProductResponse. Implement manual mappers.

issues.title: REST endpoints
issues.body: Add endpoints POST orders, GET orders id, GET orders with filters status from to pageable, POST orders id status, POST orders id cancel, POST products, GET products, PATCH products id.

issues.title: Global exception handling and error schema
issues.body: Add @ControllerAdvice. Return consistent JSON with timestamp path message details.

issues.title: Dev seed data
issues.body: Seed sample products and one customer using data.sql or CommandLineRunner for dev profile.

issues.title: Local run and OpenAPI verification
issues.body: Run mvnw spring-boot:run in dev. Verify endpoints. Verify Swagger UI at slash swagger-ui slash index.html.

issues.title: Unit tests for OrderService
issues.body: Use JUnit and Mockito. Cover stock checks, totals, and illegal transitions.

issues.title: Integration tests with Testcontainers Postgres
issues.body: Use SpringBootTest with Testcontainers. Cover place order end to end.

issues.title: Jacoco coverage threshold
issues.body: Enable Jacoco and fail build on coverage below threshold you set.

issues.title: GitHub Actions CI
issues.body: Create ci.yml that caches Maven, builds, runs tests, uploads Jacoco report artifact. Add build badge to README.

issues.title: Dockerfile multi stage
issues.body: Create multi stage Dockerfile for Spring Boot jar. Document build and run commands.

issues.title: Docker Compose with Postgres
issues.body: Create docker compose with Postgres and the app. Use env vars for DB settings. Document compose up path.

issues.title: Request logging with MDC
issues.body: Add filter that adds request id to MDC. Log request id in each log line.

issues.title: Actuator metrics curation
issues.body: Expose health info and metrics safely. Document endpoints. Keep sensitive paths disabled by default.

issues.title: README overhaul
issues.body: Add overview, feature list, tech stack, local run guide, Docker run guide, example curl, Swagger URL, architecture diagram, CI badge.

issues.title: Contributing and API reference
issues.body: Create CONTRIBUTING with style and test steps. Add API.md if you want a fixed spec in addition to Swagger.

issues.title: Project board and labels
issues.body: Create GitHub Project board Todo In Progress Review Done. Apply labels to all issues. Link issues to milestones.

issues.title: Pagination defaults
issues.body: Add pageable defaults to list endpoints. Document params.

issues.title: Product search
issues.body: Add search by name and category. Use Spring Data derived queries or custom JPQL.

issues.title: Order confirmation email or PDF invoice stub
issues.body: On order creation trigger email send or generate a PDF invoice. A stub or log is acceptable. Document behavior.

issues.title: Simple auth for write endpoints
issues.body: Protect write endpoints using Spring Security. Use in memory user or JWT if preferred. Keep it minimal.

issues.title: Static analysis
issues.body: Add SpotBugs or SonarCloud. Document how to run and view results.
